title: The Power of Prayer to Change Your Marriage Book of Prayers
features: Bestselling author Stormie Omartian presents heartfelt prayers from her newest book,
The Power of Prayer to Change Your Marriage.

Small enough to keep in purse or pocket for quick conversations with God, this little book will help unlock the power of prayer in readers' lives. They'll come away understanding as never before how to
look to God to strengthen and protect their marriage
look to God to strengthen and protect their marriage
pray for their marriage in order to keep their hearts aligned with one another
pray for their marriage in order to keep their hearts aligned with one another
overcome issues of anger, infidelity, or any other problem that might try to undo what God has joined together
overcome issues of anger, infidelity, or any other problem that might try to undo what God has joined together

Readers by the millions have loved the power and insight of Stormie's books on prayer. She now turns her attention to the deeper issues in the union between husband and wife. With the same care and insight she touches readers' lives with the truth and hope to be found in hearts that seek God.
description: is the bestselling author of the Power of a Praying
Just Enough Light for the Step I’m On
The Power of Praying® Through Fear

. (More than 41 million copies of her books have been sold worldwide.) Stormie and her husband, Michael, have been married more than 49 years. They are the parents of two married children and have two granddaughters.
